title: Person of Interest || Bloopers || /S01-S04/
author: KarxDanvers
comment: Is it just me? i can not hear words because the music is too loud :(
Would have enjoyed it without the music
It's seldom when I dislike a video, but I don't like being duped. This is not a blooper video...it's a music video.
Video 101: When you've got scenes that hinge on dialogue, don't utterly drown it out with stupid, irrelevant music at high volume.
Music is too loud. Could not hear a word
